Compiles the deferred action typed data to sign.

## Import

```ts
import { PermissionBuilder } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```

## Returns

`Promise<{typedData: DeferredActionTypedData, fullPreSignatureDeferredActionDigest: Hex}>`
The deferred action typed data and the full pre-signature deferred action digest.
